channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Today, the right-wing media sets the news agenda in this country.
item.source:markdown: Today, the right-wing media sets the news agenda in this country.

item.description: Wannabe Trump attorney general threatens Letitia James with prison.

item.description: For Texas Democrats, a Lost Decade.
item.source:markdown: For Texas Democrats, a Lost Decade.

item.description: "That [voters] were insufficiently alarmed about the damage Trump will do – and that they actually thought he has some way to make the economy better and bring inflation down – was the result of a massive information system failure."
item.source:markdown: "That [voters] were insufficiently alarmed about the damage Trump will do – and that they actually thought he has some way to make the economy better and bring inflation down – was the result of a massive information system failure."

item.description: If Trump has any positive quality, it’s that he doesn’t apologize for being a man.

item.description: I missed this piece by Dan Gillmor in October about the 30th anniversary of Scripting News. Dan was the first journalist we showed our Edit This Page innovation to in 1999, and in turn he was the first blogger in journalism. Thanks for the callout Dan.
item.source:markdown: I missed this piece by Dan Gillmor in October about the 30th anniversary of Scripting News. Dan was the first journalist we showed our Edit This Page innovation to in 1999, and in turn he was the first blogger in journalism. Thanks for the callout Dan.

item.description: My notes from just after the election. I think we're ready to learn the lessons, and there are some things we must do now, to preserve and build the electorate we have.

item.description: Today's Trippi podcast with James Carville is wonderful. The rapport between these veterans, and wisdom, and how they play off each other. An amazing display of intelligence and friendship.

item.description: As much as I don’t want Facebook (aka Meta) to dominate the post-twitter market, they have the best product. That’s not saying a lot. There’s big room for improvement that’s been there for many years.
item.source:markdown: As much as I don’t want Facebook (aka Meta) to dominate the post-twitter market, they have the best product. That’s not saying a lot. There’s big room for improvement that’s been there for many years.

item.description: I don't like being labeled as liberal or leftist. If I were a conservative who believed in the rule of law I would be equally appalled at the NYT coverage of this election. Our constitutional house is on fire, and our supposed leading news org treats this as a normal election. That's the problem.
item.source:markdown: I don't like being labeled as liberal or leftist. If I were a conservative who believed in the rule of law I would be equally appalled at the NYT coverage of this election. Our constitutional house is on fire, and our supposed leading news org treats this as a normal election. That's the problem.

item.description: Quincy Jones, music titan who worked with everyone from Frank Sinatra to Michael Jackson, dies at 91.
item.source:markdown: Quincy Jones, music titan who worked with everyone from Frank Sinatra to Michael Jackson, dies at 91.
